bibl.title: Inscriptions from Saint Mena's Church in Selib.
Nubian Voices II. New Texts and Studies on Christian Nubian Culture

bibl.note: Inscriptions on a stone (DBMNT 2883), an ostraca (O. Selib. sans No. d'Inv. = DBMNT 2884) and a bottle (DBMNT 2885). - Visitors inscriptions: 1. Invocation of St Menas (DBMNT 2886); - 2. Inscription of Philod( ), epideacon (DBMNT 2887); - 3. Invocation of St Menas (DBMNT 2888); - 4. Inscription of a second deacon of a king (DBMNT 2889).
bibl.seg: Agatha Deptuła, Inscriptions from Saint Mena's Church in Selib.

Adam Łajtar, Grzegorz Ochała & Jacques van der Vliet (edd.), Nubian Voices II. New Texts and Studies on Christian Nubian Culture = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XXVII (Warsaw, 2015) pp. 119-135, 7 figg.

Inscriptions on a stone (DBMNT 2883), an ostraca (O. Selib. sans No. d'Inv. = DBMNT 2884) and a bottle (DBMNT 2885). - Visitors inscriptions: 1. Invocation of St Menas (DBMNT 2886); - 2. Inscription of Philod( ), epideacon (DBMNT 2887); - 3. Invocation of St Menas (DBMNT 2888); - 4. Inscription of a second deacon of a king (DBMNT 2889).
